title: Chris Pratt teases wife Katherine Schwarzenegger's cooking fail: 'Did it go well? No.'
text:
CLOSE Congratulations are in order for Chris Pratt and Katherine Schwarzenegger! The happy couple tied the knot on Saturday in Montecito, Calif. USA TODAY

Microwave: 1, Katherine Schwarzenegger: 0.

Chris Pratt shared an Instagram post Saturday night teasing his wife of four months for her failed attempt at heating up some frozen food.

"Proud of my darling for trying to cook tonight," Pratt wrote. "Did it go well? No. No it did not. Not at all. To quote Rocky Balboa, 'It’s not how many times you get knocked down, it’s how many times you get up ... and keep moving forward.' As you can tell from the lump of coal in the center of the plate, this bagel bite never stood a chance."

He continued: "I honestly simply cannot imagine what went wrong here. Pretty simple. Microwave. 2 minutes. Maybe she thought it said 2 hours. But I want to commend her for her effort. This is a big step babe. Proud of you."

Patrick Schwarzenegger chimed in, commenting to tease his older sister: "Smh @katherineschwarzenegger," he wrote.

Pratt and Schwarzenegger tied the knot June 7 in Montecito, California. Pratt's young son, Jack, and Schwarzenegger's parents, Maria Shriver and Arnold Schwarzenegger, were in attendance.

Pratt, 40, rose to fame in NBC's series "Parks and Recreation" before movie stardom came calling, thanks to roles in the "Guardians of the Galaxy" and "Jurassic World" franchises. Schwarzenegger, 29, is an author and lifestyle blogger.

The "Parks and Recreation" alum popped the question in January, months after the pair had people guessing if they were an item when they were spotted together in June 2018.

Pratt was previously married to Anna Faris, Jack's mother, from 2009 to 2018.

Contributing: Andrea Mandell and Erin Jensen, USA TODAY

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/celebrities/2019/10/20/chris-pratt-trolls-katherine-schwarzenegger-over-cooking-fail/4046657002/
description: Microwave: 1, Katherine Schwarzenegger: 0. Chris Pratt teased his wife of four months over a failed attempt at heating up some frozen food.
